entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
